TableSpec.Name: D4 Campaign Business Process
TableSpec.Description: Parameter table for the D4 Campaign business process.
TableSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

TextField.Name: NAME
TextField.Description: The name of the parameter set

Trigger.Name: TR_USR_D4_CAMPAIGN_BUSINESSPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE
Trigger.Description: Used to delete the common business process records associated with this record.
Trigger.CreateTriggerSQL:
create trigger TR_USR_D4_CAMPAIGN_BUSINESSPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE on dbo.USR_D4_CAMPAIGN_BUSINESSPROCESS after delete not for replication as begin
delete from dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE where BUSINESSPROCESSPARAMETERSETID in (select ID from deleted) and BUSINESSPROCESSCATALOGID = '0D586E6B-8B8A-4386-8167-EEB07A37A262'; -- guid is the ID from business process spec - see D4Campaign.BusinessProcess.xml end
